MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Trem Eilian and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are awaiting further specialists to repair the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.45PM on 3rd December 2020.
